title: Maya Tulum Cuisine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Buffet, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Caribbean, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Hotel restaurant serving vegetarian and seafood. Large menu with some vegan suitable dishes. The buffet also includes vegan items. Located on the beach, the resort caters to yoga retreats. Please send HappyCow a link to correct map position.
streetAddress: Carretera Boca Paila Punta Allen, Km 7, Zona Hotelera
